documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.openlistDesc: Manage your cloud storage with OpenList
documentation.rcloneDesc: Command line program to manage files on cloud storage

confirmUninstall.title: Confirm Uninstall
confirmUninstall.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall the OpenList service? This will stop all functionality and make the application unusable until the service is reinstalled.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your OpenList Desktop application
settings.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This action cannot be undone.
settings.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

network.subtitle: Configure the web interface and network settings

binaryPath.label: OpenList Binary Path
binaryPath.help: Path to the OpenList executable file

autoLaunch.description: Automatically start OpenList service when the application launches

config.title: Remote Storage
config.subtitle: Configure rclone for remote storage access

config.tips: Enter your rclone configuration as JSON. This will be used to configure rclone remotes.
config.invalidJson: Invalid JSON configuration. Please check your syntax.

binaryPath.label: Rclone Binary Path
binaryPath.help: Path to the rclone executable file

configName.label: Configuration Name
configName.help: Name of the rclone remote configuration

mount.title: Mount Configuration
mount.subtitle: Configure local mount point for remote storage

mountPath.label: Mount Path
mountPath.help: Local directory where remote storage will be mounted

autoMount.title: Auto-mount on startup
autoMount.description: Automatically mount remote storage when the service starts

interval.label: Monitor Interval (seconds)
interval.help: How often to refresh system metrics and status

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.subtitle: Learn how to use OpenList Desktop
tutorial.help: Restart the tutorial to learn about app features and navigation

autoCheck.title: Automatic Update Checks
autoCheck.description: Automatically check for and notify about new updates in the background

autoStartApp.title: Auto-launch on startup
autoStartApp.subtitle: Automatically start OpenList Desktop application when the system starts
autoStartApp.description: Automatically start OpenList service when the application launches

service.subtitle: Configure connection to the desktop service

port.label: Service Port
port.help: Port number for the desktop service communication

apiToken.label: Service API Token
apiToken.help: Token used to authenticate with the desktop service

performance.subtitle: Performance and optimization settings
performance.coming: Performance settings will be available in a future update

logging.subtitle: Configure application logging behavior
logging.coming: Logging configuration will be available in a future update

viewer.noLogsMatch: No logs match your search criteria
viewer.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filters
viewer.logsWillAppear: Logs will appear here when services are running

messages.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

meta.openInExplorer: Click to open in file explorer

empty.title: No Remote Configurations
empty.description: Create your first remote configuration to start mounting cloud storage.

messages.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the remote configuration "{name}"?

welcome.title: Welcome to OpenList Desktop
welcome.content: Welcome to OpenList Desktop! This tutorial will guide you through the key features and help you get started quickly.

navigation.title: Navigation Panel
navigation.content: Use the navigation panel to access different sections: Dashboard for monitoring, Mount for storage management, Logs for troubleshooting, and Settings for configuration.

service.title: Install & Start Service
service.content: First, you need to install and start the OpenList service. This is the core component that manages your cloud storage connections.

openlist.title: OpenList Core Access
openlist.content: Once the service is running, you can access the OpenList web interface to manage your files and configurations.

documentation.title: Read Documentation
documentation.content: For detailed information and advanced configurations, check out the documentation section. You'll find guides, API docs, and troubleshooting tips.

settings.title: Settings & Configuration
settings.content: Customize your OpenList experience in the Settings section. Configure themes, service options, and storage preferences.

update.title: App Updates
update.subtitle: Keep your application up to date with the latest features and security improvements
update.autoCheckInfo: Automatic update checks keep your app secure and up-to-date
update.securityInfo: Updates include important security patches and bug fixes
update.backupInfo: Your data is automatically backed up before major updates
update.releaseChannelsInfo: We use GitHub releases to manage app updates.
